definition: working couple (husband and wife both employed)

sentences.english: They were all dual-earner couples -- both husband and wife held full-time jobs.
sentences.chinese: 研究對象都是雙職工，即夫婦二人都有全職工作。

sentences.english: In double-career families children are often neglected.
sentences.chinese: 在“雙職工”家庭，孩子經常被忽略。

sentences.english: Health experts are predicting severe strains on the state and on working families here.
sentences.chinese: 健康專家預期國家和雙職工家庭將面臨巨大的壓力。

sentences.english: Convenience dishes are very welcome to the families of working couples.
sentences.chinese: 烹製簡便的萊餚，深受雙職工家庭的歡迎。

sentences.english: My family is a two-career family with both my parents working.
sentences.chinese: 我父母都工作，所以我家是“雙職工”家庭。

sentences.english: Both one- and two-income households probably need more.
sentences.chinese: 單職工和雙職工家庭都可能需要更多的保險。

sentences.english: So what do working families eat?
sentences.chinese: 那麼雙職工家庭喫什麼呢？
